analytics and reporting This level combines 23 sources of structured data with a consistent identifier Identifies ways to develop sustainable data provisioning solutions Addresses quality issues for data sets by identifying the root cause and potential solutions Updates or develops dashboards Supports efforts to close data quality gaps by meeting data training needs within the business Works under some supervisionppstrongMAJOR DUTIESstrongppDescription of the major duties performed in this jobpulliLocates and acquires data from existing data locations external sources and new data sources and focuses on developing sustainable data usage for designated stakeholders including access costs and organization processesliliParticipates in creating analytics models by applying data knowledge
